max-width.$description: Maximum width of expandable cell panel.

max-height.$description: Maximum height of expandable cell panel.

z-index.$description: Z-index for expandable cell panel (should appear above table).

shadow.$description: Shadow for expandable cell panel. Large shadow for elevation.

radius.$description: Border radius for expandable cell panel.

padding.$description: Padding for expandable cell panel content.

duration.$description: Transition duration for expandable cell panel animation.

easing.$description: Easing function for expandable cell panel animation.
